structure.unit: A PLANNING AND OVERSIGHT OF GOVERNMENTAL FINANCE

law.catch_line: Use of existing studies, surveys, plans, and data.
law.text: The board may make use of existing studies, surveys, plans, data, and other materials in the possession of any state agency. Upon request by the board, an agency shall make these materials available to the board so that the board may have current information on the capital plans and programs of the agency.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 503, sec. 8, effective July 13, 1990.
